summary: A luxury e-commerce website called 'Signature Home Decor LLP' targeting USA & international customers. Premium editorial design inspired by Restoration Hardware/Pottery Barn with ivory, beige, matte black, and champagne gold palette. Full site with 6 pages, shop filters, product detail, cart, wishlist, coupon system, admin dashboard, blog, and AI-style product recommendations.
architectural_notes: Website name: Signature Home Decor LLP
Design inspired by Restoration Hardware, Pottery Barn, West Elm — luxury editorial aesthetic
Color palette: Ivory, Warm White, Beige, Matte Black, Champagne Gold accents
Typography: large bold serif headings + clean sans-serif body text
No third-party payment gateway, Google Maps, or external AI chatbot integrations
Product price range: $100–$600 USD, all prices displayed in USD format
Categories expanded to 7: Living Room, Bedroom, Kitchen, Outdoor, Office, Dining Room, Garden
known_issues: Repeated build failures likely due to budget/iteration limits — simplified builds (15-20 products instead of 200) recommended

existing_features.title: Create a visually distinct Google-inspired theme: clean white backgrounds, bold primary color accents (red, blue, yellow, green), crisp sans-serif typography (similar to Product Sans / Roboto), generous whitespace, card-based layouts, and a consistent color palette applied throughout all pages and components.

Build a Home Page for 'Signature Home Decor LLP' that includes: a top navigation bar with the brand name 'Signature Home Decor LLP' and a logo, a hero section with a welcoming headline and call-to-action, a featured categories section (e.g., Living Room, Bedroom, Kitchen, Outdoor), and a footer with the brand name and tagline.

Build a Home Decor Items catalog section on the home page that displays a grid of product cards. Each card should show a product image placeholder, product name, short description, category tag, and a price. Include a simple category filter bar to let users filter items by room/type.

Connect the frontend catalog section to the backend via React Query to fetch and display live product data from the Motoko actor. Use the getProducts and getProductsByCategory queries for real-time filtering.

Redesign the overall visual theme to a luxury editorial aesthetic inspired by Restoration Hardware and Pottery Barn. Replace the current Google-inspired color palette with ivory, warm white, beige, matte black, and champagne gold accents. Switch typography to large bold serif headings (e.g., Playfair Display or similar) paired with a clean sans-serif body font. Apply generous whitespace, soft animations, smooth scrolling, and a mobile-first fully responsive layout throughout all pages and components.

Rebuild the Home Page with: a cinematic full-width hero section with a luxury lifestyle background image, a brand tagline, and a CTA; a Featured Collections section; a Best Sellers section; a logic-based AI-style product recommendations section (e.g., based on category popularity); a Testimonials section; and an Instagram-style gallery section with decorative lifestyle image tiles.

Build a Shop Page with: category filter tabs (Wall Decor, Lighting, Furniture, Art, Accessories), a price range filter, and sorting options (Newest, Best Selling, Price High–Low, Price Low–High). Products should be fetched from the backend and filtered/sorted client-side. Include a smart search bar with auto-suggestions that filters the visible product list in real time.

Build a Product Detail Page accessible at /product/:id. It must include: a large image gallery with zoom-on-hover, product name, description, price (USD), category tag, variant selection (e.g., color or size if applicable), Add to Cart button, Add to Wishlist button, Shipping & Return info accordion, and a Related Products section showing up to 4 items from the same category.

Implement a persistent Cart and Wishlist stored in frontend state (React Context or Zustand). A cart drawer or cart page at /cart must show all added items with quantity controls, subtotal, and a proceed-to-checkout button. A wishlist page at /wishlist must list saved products with an option to move them to cart.

Build a Checkout Page at /checkout with a single-page layout including: order summary panel, guest checkout form (name, email, shipping address), coupon code input that applies a percentage or fixed discount, and an Order Total section. On 'Place Order' submission, store the order in the Motoko backend and show a confirmation message.
Build an About Us page at /about with a brand story narrative for Signature Home Decor LLP, a Vision & Mission section, and a luxury editorial layout with large imagery and editorial typography.

Build a Contact Page at /contact with: a contact form (name, email, subject, message) that stores submissions in the Motoko backend, and a floating WhatsApp chat button that opens a WhatsApp link (wa.me) with a pre-filled message.

Build an Admin Dashboard page at /admin (no auth required for now) that allows: viewing all products with edit/delete options, adding new products (name, description, category, price, imageUrl), viewing all placed orders with status, and viewing contact form submissions.

Build a Blog section with a Blog listing page at /blog and individual post pages at /blog/:id. Pre-populate the Motoko backend with at least 4 sample blog posts (title, excerpt, body, author, date, category). The listing page should display post cards in a grid layout.

Add site-wide navigation with React Router supporting all routes: / (Home), /shop, /product/:id, /cart, /wishlist, /checkout, /about, /contact, /admin, /blog, /blog/:id. Update the Header navigation links accordingly. Add a persistent floating WhatsApp chat button visible on all pages.

Build a fully navigable React frontend with React Router covering all routes: / (Home), /shop, /product/:id, /cart, /wishlist, /checkout, /about, /contact, /admin, /blog, /blog/:id. Apply the luxury ivory/beige/matte black/champagne gold theme with Playfair Display serif headings throughout all pages.
Build the Home page with: a cinematic full-width hero section with headline and CTA, a Featured Categories section (7 categories), a Best Sellers section (top 4 products), and a Testimonials section.

Build the Shop page at /shop with category filter tabs, price range filter, sort options (Newest, Best Selling, Price High–Low, Price Low–High), and a search bar that filters products in real time. Fetch products from the backend via React Query.

Build the Product Detail page at /product/:id with product image, name, description, price (USD), category tag, Add to Cart button, Add to Wishlist button, a Shipping & Return info accordion, and a Related Products section showing up to 4 items from the same category.

Implement persistent Cart (React Context) and Wishlist state. Cart page at /cart shows items with quantity controls and subtotal. Wishlist page at /wishlist lists saved products with a Move to Cart option.

Build the Checkout page at /checkout with guest form (name, email, shipping address), coupon code input applying a discount, order summary panel, and a Place Order button that calls placeOrder on the Motoko backend and shows a confirmation message.
Build the About Us page at /about with a brand story for Signature Home Decor LLP, a Vision & Mission section, and luxury editorial layout.

Build the Contact page at /contact with a form (name, email, subject, message) that submits to the Motoko backend via submitContact, and a floating WhatsApp button opening wa.me with a pre-filled message visible on all pages.

Build the Admin Dashboard at /admin (no authentication required) with four tabs: Products (add/edit/delete), Orders (view all with status), Contact Submissions (view all), and Blog Posts (add/edit/delete). All data fetched from and written to the Motoko backend.
Build the Blog listing page at /blog showing post cards in a grid, and individual post pages at /blog/:id displaying full post content. Data fetched from the Motoko backend.
